import React from 'react'; import axios from "axios"; import { Route, Redirect, Switch, withRouter } from "react-router-dom"; import Client from "../../../pages/Client"; class RegisterModal extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { lastName: "", firstName: "", email: "", password: "", age: "", heightFeet: "", heightInches: "", weight: "", redirect: false, showModal: true, } } handleInputChange = event => { const { name, value } = event.target; this.setState({ [name]: value }, () => console.log(this.state)) } registerUser = (event) => { const signUpInfo = this.state axios.post("/auth", signUpInfo).then(res => { window.location = "/mypage" }) } render() { return (
